mapper.select: SELECT V1.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID , V1.WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ V1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE V1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND V1.WARE_NO = '100002' AND V1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND V1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT CD_VLD_VAL AS LGST_WK_MTHD_CD , CD_CNTN AS LGST_WK_MTHD_PD_NM FROM T_CMZ_CD_D C WHERE 1=1 AND C.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND C.CD_ID = 'LGST_WK_MTHD_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL IN ('WE13', 'WE14', 'WE15', 'WE16', 'WE17', 'WE18', 'WE25', 'WE99' ,'WE26', 'WE27', 'WE28' /* 고객출고_사은품(화장품/건강식품/기타_신규)*/ , 'WE19' /*고객판매_정기배송 (커피)*/ , 'WE20' /*고객판매_정기배송 (홈카페캡슐)*/ , 'WE21' /*고객판매_정기배송 (건강식품)*/ , 'WE22' /*고객판매_정기배송 (화장품)*/ , 'WE24' /*고객판매_정기배송 (혼합)*/ ) ORDER BY CD_VLD_VAL
